pages.mywords.myWordsDetails.hereyourlis: Here you have your word list
info.lading.s1.t1: Here you will find an application with which you can finally learn Spanish and other languages
info.lading.slogan: Absolutely all the vocabulary, lessons, and conversations you need to learn Languages.
info.lading.s1.t2:
Interact, make mistakes, receive feedback, make more mistakes!
( Õ°üëÅÔ∏è‚ÄØÕú ñ Õ°üëÅÔ∏è) No judgmental people, don't give up, try again
info.lading.s1.t4: Simply the best language learning experience!
info.lading.explanation.t1: Polilan is a platform for learning languages, with a focus on English. It uses ultra-efficient methods that have been proven to work, such as spaced repetition, the forgetting curve, dynamic explanations, and error feedback.
info.lading.explanation.t2: You will be able to listen to the correct pronunciation, save your vocabulary, take lessons, and practice with educational examples.
info.lading.explanation.t3: But when the time comes (after a few days of use) üò±, you will discover that it is powered by AI. The system will know your weaknesses, test you, provide you with the content/lessons you need, and teach you how to improve your mistakes.
info.lading.explanation.t4: The app has a free plan. For conversations, you'll need a premium plan. It's a web application accessible from any browser. On Android, you can download it from here. Native versions for iOS and Android will be coming soon.
info.lading.s3.t1: Improve your vocabulary, register the words you want to learn, thanks to our best adaptation of study cards you will memorize the words faster.
info.lading.s3.t2: And when you don't know which new word to master in your vocabulary, don't worry, our AI will select the best words for you.
info.lading.s3.t3: Vocabulary is important, but more important is learning to use the words in a real context.
info.lading.s3.t4: Listen and practice with real and practical examples, you have to speak, start with shadowing, repeat what you hear. The AI will give you feedback and help you improve your pronunciation.
info.lading.s3.t5: Did you really learn? Take the lessons, but wait, it's not that boring. Each lesson is dynamic and interactive, you can select the elements and save them in your vocabulary.
info.lading.s4.t1: It's a progressive app, which means it's a web application optimized for mobile, and if you're using Android, you can install it with one click
info.lading.s4.t2: Powered by Machine Learning and GPTs.
info.lading.s4.t3: Progress Tracking: Keep a record of your progress and see how your fluency in English increases over time.
info.lading.s4.t4: Free and entertaining content on social media
info.lading.s4.t5: Adapts and learns from your mistakes
info.lading.s4.t6: For any age, for any level
info.lading.s4.t7: We are committed to always being at the forefront with technologies and learning methods
